plot: The film is about a young boy who is a 'untouchable' The narration follows his travails and triumphs. Does he succeed in being accepted in the society around him?
title: Kariya Kanbitta
plot_es: The film is about a young boy who is a 'untouchable' The narration follows his travails and triumphs. Does he succeed in being accepted in the society around him?
